content: stitch markers to be used during pm = place marker repeat = repeat buttonhole placement rn = right needle round s = round s 3-4 buttons 3/4-7/8 in diameter rs = right sidesl = slip sm = slip marker 2 pieces of scrap yarn st s = stitch es st st = stockinette st tapestry needle to weave in ends ws = wrong side yo = yarn-over construction stitch patterns audrey s first day is knit in one-piece starting at the stockinette stitch neck with top-down raglan construction front pieces flat knit on rs row purl on ws row are shaped as you work to create v-neck at the un- in the round knit all rnds derarm sleeve stitches are put on holders as you work the body to the hem sleeve stitches are then trans- fered to dpn s and worked in the round to the cuff button bands are created by picking up stitches along each front edge and back neck www elizabethsmithknits com 1 size 3t only instructions row 1 rs kfb yo sm k2 sm yo *k to marker yo sm k2 sm yo repeat from * 2 more times kfb of beginning last st - 46 sts row 2 & all ws row moving forward p to end using us 8/5 mm 24 /60 cm circ and mc slipping markers as you reach them co 36 36 36 36 36 40 40 sts row 3 *k to marker yo sm k2 sm yo repeat from * raglan set-up row ws p1 for front pm p2 for 3 more times k to end - 54 sts raglan seam pm p 4 4 4 4 4 5 5 for sleeve pm row 5 kfb *k to marker yo sm k2 sm yo repeat p2 for raglan seam pm p 18 18 18 18 18 20 20 from * 3 more times k to last 2 sts kfb k1 - 64 sts for back neck pm p2 for raglan seam pm p 4 4 repeat row 3-6 1 more time - 82 sts 4 4 4 5 5 for sleeve pm p2 for raglan seam pm row 11 *k to marker yo sm k2 sm yo repeat from p1 for front * 3 more times k to end - 90 sts raglan & neck shaping row 13 *k to marker yo sm k2 sm yo repeat from * 3 more times k to end - 98 sts you will be working raglan increase row every other row 15 kfb *k to marker yo sm k2 sm yo repeat row as well as v-neck shaping row every 4th 6th or from * 3 more times k to last 2 sts kfb k1 - 108 sts 8th row depending on the size because the rate of in- repeat row 11-16 2 more times - 160 sts creasing for the v-neck changes for each size instruc- tions for the yoke are broken out based on size below size 4t only size
